name.ja: <ruby>伍世壊心像<rt>マナドゥム・イマジン</rt></ruby>

text.en: Reveal 1 "Manadome" monster or 1 "Visas Starfrost" in your hand; draw 2 cards, then place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monster you control with 1500 ATK/2100 DEF; it is treated as a Tuner until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Manadome Imagining" once per turn.
